column4: does anyone know how to compare two folders. i moved the music folders off my ipod, but the orginial folder had 1010 files in 6.6 GB while the folder i moved it two ended up with 1010 files in 6.4GB. I know during the moved some files were skipped, since i had to set it to autoskip, but i don't know which ones.
if you started with 1010 files, and ended with 1010 files, chances are you have all the files, the total disk space consumed is probably less because you've copied it to a more efficient filesystem.
the thing is i got several messages during the transfer saying "error while copying xxxx.mp3 or whatever."
